https://github.com/microsoft/Windows-driver-samples.git
https://github.com/u-boot/u-boot.git
https://github.com/matt-wu/Ext3Fsd.git



创建8G VHD，配置为MBR，单分区Fat32格式

// 0x0 -- MBR
33C08ED0BC007C8EC08ED8BE007CBF00
06B90002FCF3A450681C06CBFBB90400
BDBE07807E00007C0B0F850E0183C510
E2F1CD1888560055C6461105C6461000
B441BBAA55CD135D720F81FB55AA7509
F7C101007403FE46106660807E100074
2666680000000066FF76086800006800
7C680100681000B4428A56008BF4CD13
9F83C4109EEB14B80102BB007C8A5600
8A76018A4E028A6E03CD136661731CFE
4E11750C807E00800F848A00B280EB84
5532E48A5600CD135DEB9E813EFE7D55
AA756EFF7600E88D007517FAB0D1E664
E88300B0DFE660E87C00B0FFE664E875
00FBB800BBCD1A6623C0753B6681FB54
435041753281F90201722C666807BB00
00666800020000666808000000665366
5366556668000000006668007C000066
6168000007CD1A5A32F6EA007C0000CD
18A0B707EB08A0B607EB03A0B50732E4
0500078BF0AC3C007409BB0700B40ECD
10EBF2F4EBFD2BC9E464EB002402E0F8
2402C3496E76616C6964207061727469
74696F6E207461626C65004572726F72
206C6F6164696E67206F706572617469
6E672073797374656D004D697373696E
67206F7065726174696E672073797374
656D000000637B9A44548DB300000020
21000CFEFFFF0008000000E8FF000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
000000000000000000000000000055AA


00 - 202100 - 0C - FEFFFF - 00080000 - 00E8FF00
start sector = 0x800
sector count = 0xFFE800
partition 1 byte offset = 0x800 * 512 = 0x100000


// 0x100000
EB5890 - 4D53444F53352E30 - 0002 - 08 - 5A20
0200000000F800003F00FF0000080000
00E8FF00D33F00000000000002000000
01000600000000000000000000000000
8000298D7A99264E4F204E414D452020
2020464154333220202033C98ED1BCF4
7B8EC18ED9BD007C885640884E028A56
40B441BBAA55CD13721081FB55AA750A
F6C1017405FE4602EB2D8A5640B408CD
137305B9FFFF8AF1660FB6C640660FB6
D180E23FF7E286CDC0ED0641660FB7C9
66F7E1668946F8837E16007539837E2A
007733668B461C6683C00CBB0080B901
00E82C00E9A803A1F87D80C47C8BF0AC
84C074173CFF7409B40EBB0700CD10EB
EEA1FA7DEBE4A17D80EBDF98CD16CD19
6660807E02000F842000666A00665006
53666810000100B4428A56408BF4CD13

0000000000000000AC01B901000055AA

EB --> AA  默认的FAT驱动无法识别
